product_overview: Branding Pioneers Agency Management System (PioneerOS) is an integrated, role-based platform designed to centralize all agency operations including employee and client data management, performance tracking, sales pipeline, accounts and compliance, and reporting to enable data-driven decisions and transparent communication.
core_goals: Create a Single Source of Truth (SSOT) for employee and client data with secure, role-based access.
Provide operational clarity by tracking employee assignments, client projects, and their corresponding results with proof.
Enable objective monthly performance scoring feeding into quarterly strategic and annual appraisals.
Ensure financial hygiene via visibility into payments and compliance status with associated proofs.
Enhance sales rigor through pipeline stage tracking, conversion analytics, and lead source analysis.
Promote a culture of continuous learning by enforcing mandatory learning hours and linking to appraisal outcomes.
key_features: Multi-role authentication system with session management and role-based access control.
Role-specific dashboards for Super Admin, Admin, Operations Head, HR, Sales, Accountant, and various employee roles including freelancers and interns.
Comprehensive employee onboarding, directory, and performance tracking modules.
Client onboarding and management with project scope, billing, and compliance tracking.
Dynamic monthly tactical forms capturing KPIs, proofs, and learning data, with auto-generated quarterly strategic reviews.
Sales pipeline management with stage tracking, lead sources, and conversion analytics in a Kanban interface.
Accounts and compliance modules covering recurring and one-time payments, GST filing, and books closure with proof enforcement.
Operations Head dashboard displaying client health via NPS, scope completion, and results visualization.
Super Admin controls for master data, leaderboards, audit logs, and export capabilities.
Gamification (Arcade) system for employee engagement with points and rewards.
Notification and alert system for due items, missing proofs, and non-compliance flags.
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate via secure login and are assigned roles which determine their dashboard views and permissions.
Employees complete monthly tactical reports selecting clients and projects, entering KPIs, attaching proof URLs, and submitting for performance scoring.
Operations Heads review client health metrics including NPS and completion rates using provided dashboards and generate monthly leadership reports.
Sales personnel manage leads through customizable pipeline stages via drag-and-drop Kanban boards with analytic insights.
Accountants handle payment tracking and compliance records with proof upload, viewing statuses and reports.
Admins manage master data, permissions, and audit logs, and configure system settings.
Super Admins have full visibility and control including export of reports and auditing system changes.
validation_criteria: All KPI, payment, and compliance entries marked as done must have valid proof URLs.
Monthly tactical reports cannot be finalized with missing mandatory fields or proofs.
Appraisal delays apply automatically if learning hours fall below the required minimum with proof.
Sales dashboard metrics accurately reflect total leads, conversion rates, source breakdowns, and cold call counts.
Accounts dashboard correctly classifies payment statuses for recurring and one-time payments with proof attachments.
PDF and CSV exports for individual and team reports generate successfully within 10 seconds.
Role-based access control prevents unauthorized route access and properly redirects users.
Audit logs capture all critical view, edit, and delete actions across modules.
Notifications for due submissions, payments, and compliance are triggered according to schedule and severity.
System achieves 99.5% uptime with median dashboard load times under 2 seconds for up to 10k records.
